title: ozing
author: ozing
content: If you are looking for ways to make some extra money online and you use the internet daily, then you can make money by simply using your browser without doing some extra work.With this method, you can generate passive income while you enjoy browsing through your favourite website. To get started all you need to do is install the browser or extension and start making money but make sure you enable the earning option otherwise you will not make any money.list of Web Browsers and Extensions that PayBrave BrowserYou can earn when you install the brave browser on your laptop or mobile phone, users of this browser normally earn in the form of cryptocurrency known as BAT (Basic Attention Token). You can earn BAT in three ways and these includeViewing anonymous ads: The Brave browser shows you ads and when you click and view them you will earn BAT as a free crypto reward which goes straight to your wallet which can be found in the brave browser.BAT price is currently $0.3 and it's trading on Binance and other exchanges like CoinbaseÂ  https://tipsboom.com/5-browsers-and-extensions-that-will-pay-you-to-browse/
